mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_Code, seller_Id, goods_Name, goods_Cate, goods_Price,goods_Sta, goods_Des, goods_Pic, phone_Num, goods_State) values (goods_seq.nextval, #{seller_Id},#{goods_Name}, #{goods_Cate}, #{goods_Price}, #{goods_Sta} ,#{goods_Des}, #{goods_Pic}, #{phone_Num}, #{goods_State})
mapper.select: select goods_Code, seller_Id, goods_Name, goods_Cate, goods_Sta,goods_Price, goods_Des, goods_Pic, goods_Date, phone_Num, goods_State from goods where goods_State='대기중' OR goods_State = '거래중' order by goods_Code desc
select review_Code, review_Content, review_Sta, Review_Writer from review where review_Trader = #{goods_Id} order by review_Code desc

where goods_Code = ${goods_Code}
